title.rendered: “Crackdown on Terrorism: IDF Forces Arrest 10 Wanted Individuals in Judea and Samaria”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

IDF forces, the Shin Bet and Border Police arrested ten wanted individuals involved in terrorist activity across Judea and Samaria last night.

In the city of Hebron and the village of Yatta in the Judea Brigade, the forces arrested three wanted individuals and interrogated multiple suspects.

In Tulkarem in Menashe, in Husan in the Etzion Brigade, and in El Bireh and Anata in the Binyamin Brigade, the soldiers arrested five wanted individuals.

In operations in Birzeit in the Binyamin Brigade, the forces arrested two wanted individuals and also confiscated military equipment.

The wanted individuals who were arrested and the weapons that were confiscated have been handed over for further handling by the security forces, our forces were not injured.

So far, since the beginning of the war, about 4,000 wanted individuals have been arrested across the Judea and Samaria Division and in the Jordan Valley and Valleys Brigade, about 1,700 of them are affiliated with the Hamas terrorist organization.

Attached is documentation of the forces’ activity across Judea and Samaria: https://bit.ly/44Q2pDt

Attached are pictures from the forces’ activity across Judea and Samaria: https://idfanc.activetrail.biz/ANC150520247648
